title: Top tech schools make progress in bridging gender gap - Economic Times
content: Top tech schools make progress in bridging gender gap  Economic Times
description: At least two in 10 students in first-year undergraduate batches at top engineering colleges including Indian Institutes of Technology (IITs) of Delhi, Hyderabad, Madras, Kanpur, Kharagpur and Roorkee, and National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jalandhar are women, a sharp improvement from 8% across all IITs in 2017.
